Its work fine but in crack readme is faild 
1)the Battle.net-patch.MPQ should go to the StarCraft II\Battle.net\ dont replace old one just add this 

2)the SC2.exe should go to the StarCraft II\Versions\Base15405 and replace the existed one

3)start game and if its ok you shoudl see the main b.net screen not the login screen and DOWN LEFT the Orange Button Start Campaign shoudl work! (not the single player up left)

If you folow this it must work!!!
Btw if you apply crack before first update game should never work....
